title: What’s Going On With Team USA? Plus: Can the Warriors Land Bradley Beal? | Real Ones
description:
Logan and Raja talk USA men’s basketball losing to France in the Olympics (5:00), as well as roster challenges and where Team USA may finish (19:45). Then, what happens if Bradley Beal is traded to the Warriors, and what does that mean for the rest of the NBA (22:49)? Plus: The Lakers shop Kyle Kuzma to every team in the league (34:20).

Hosts: Logan Murdock and Raja Bell
Associate Producer: Stefan Anderson
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
